lower.description: Estimated minimum possible sum for the geometric mechanism, when doing an integer sum.

upper.description: Estimated maximum possible sum for the geometric mechanism, when doing an integer sum.

name: dp_sum

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release.

return.description: Differentially private sum over elements for each column of the data.

description: Returns differentially private estimates of the sums of each column of the data.
